00015 #include "graph.h"
00016 
00017 #include "test.h"
00018 
00019 struct GraphTest : public StateTestWithBuiltinRules {
00020   VirtualFileSystem fs_;
00021 };
00022 
00023 TEST_F(GraphTest, MissingImplicit) {
00024   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(&state_,
00025 "build out: cat in | implicit\n"));
00026   fs_.Create("in", 1, "");
00027   fs_.Create("out", 1, "");
00028 
00029   Edge* edge = GetNode("out")->in_edge_;
00030   string err;
00031   EXPECT_TRUE(edge->RecomputeDirty(&state_, &fs_, &err));
00032   ASSERT_EQ("", err);
00033 
00034   // A missing implicit dep does not make the output dirty.
00035   EXPECT_FALSE(GetNode("out")->dirty_);
00036 }
00037 
00038 TEST_F(GraphTest, FunkyMakefilePath) {
00039   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(&state_,
00040 "rule catdep\n"
00041 "  depfile = $out.d\n"
00042 "  command = cat $in > $out\n"
00043 "build out.o: catdep foo.cc\n"));
00044   fs_.Create("implicit.h", 2, "");
00045   fs_.Create("foo.cc", 1, "");
00046   fs_.Create("out.o.d", 1, "out.o: ./foo/../implicit.h\n");
00047   fs_.Create("out.o", 1, "");
00048 
00049   Edge* edge = GetNode("out.o")->in_edge_;
00050   string err;
00051   EXPECT_TRUE(edge->RecomputeDirty(&state_, &fs_, &err));
00052   ASSERT_EQ("", err);
00053 
00054   // implicit.h has changed, though our depfile refers to it with a
00055   // non-canonical path; we should still find it.
00056   EXPECT_TRUE(GetNode("out.o")->dirty_);
00057 }
00058 
00059 TEST_F(GraphTest, ExplicitImplicit) {
00060   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(&state_,
00061 "rule catdep\n"
00062 "  depfile = $out.d\n"
00063 "  command = cat $in > $out\n"
00064 "build implicit.h: cat data\n"
00065 "build out.o: catdep foo.cc || implicit.h\n"));
00066   fs_.Create("data", 2, "");
00067   fs_.Create("implicit.h", 1, "");
00068   fs_.Create("foo.cc", 1, "");
00069   fs_.Create("out.o.d", 1, "out.o: implicit.h\n");
00070   fs_.Create("out.o", 1, "");
00071 
00072   Edge* edge = GetNode("out.o")->in_edge_;
00073   string err;
00074   EXPECT_TRUE(edge->RecomputeDirty(&state_, &fs_, &err));
00075   ASSERT_EQ("", err);
00076 
00077   // We have both an implicit and an explicit dep on implicit.h.
00078   // The implicit dep should "win" (in the sense that it should cause
00079   // the output to be dirty).
00080   EXPECT_TRUE(GetNode("out.o")->dirty_);
00081 }
00082 
00083 TEST_F(GraphTest, PathWithCurrentDirectory) {
00084   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(&state_,
00085 "rule catdep\n"
00086 "  depfile = $out.d\n"
00087 "  command = cat $in > $out\n"
00088 "build ./out.o: catdep ./foo.cc\n"));
00089   fs_.Create("./foo.cc", 1, "");
00090   fs_.Create("./out.o.d", 1, "out.o: foo.cc\n");
00091   fs_.Create("./out.o", 1, "");
00092 
00093   Edge* edge = GetNode("./out.o")->in_edge_;
00094   string err;
00095   EXPECT_TRUE(edge->RecomputeDirty(&state_, &fs_, &err));
00096   ASSERT_EQ("", err);
00097 
00098   EXPECT_FALSE(GetNode("./out.o")->dirty_);
00099 }
